alert.note: Alert for Goliad (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 10 at 7:42PM CDT until August 10 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN VICTORIA AND NORTHEASTERN GOLIAD COUNTIES... At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Weesatche, or 10 miles southeast of Yorktown, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Weesatche, Weser and Ander. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 628 and 640. US Highway 59 near mile marker 668. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
